email.description: Email address of support or author

categories.description: Categories applying to Pack. Taken from https://xsoar.pan.dev/docs/packs/packs-format#pack_metadatajson

tags.description: Tags to be attached to the Pack in XSOAR Marketplace

useCases.description: Use cases associated to the Pack. Taken from https://xsoar.pan.dev/docs/concepts/use-cases

keywords.description: Keywords to help the Pack to be discovered in the XSOAR Marketplace

marketplaces.description: The marketplaces where this Pack will be available

hidden.description: (Optional) Whether to hide the pack from Marketplace. Updates to this pack will not be published to Marketplace and the pack cannot be installed.

eulaLink.description: Premium Packs only. URL to Pack license agreement.

price.description: Premium Packs only. The price in Palo Alto Points

dependencies.description: (Optional) An object that describes the content packs that the pack is dependant on. Should be kept empty on pack creation, as it is calculated by Cortex XSOAR content infrastructure.

displayedImages.description: (Optional) Images to be displayed in Cortex XSOAR marketplace. Should be kept empty on pack creation, as it is calculated by Cortex XSOAR content infrastructure.

githubUser.description: List of Github usernames to receive notification in the PR in case pack files were modified.

devEmail.description: List of emails to receive notification in the PR in case pack files were modified.

certification.description: If the pack is certifed the value of this fields should be 'certified'

itemPrefix.description: String to overwrite pack fields prefix. You can specify an alternative string instead of the default pack name enforced by the validation process.
